cities.name: Atlantic City
cities.quote:
“Atlantic City fueled a lot of growth for me… the money I took out of there was incredible.”
- How Donald Trump Bankrupted His Atlantic City Casinos, but Still Earned Millions
New York Times, June 11, 2016

cities.name: Chicago
cities.quote:
Chicago Approves Plan To Block Trump's Name on His Tower With Giant, Flying Pigs
- Heat Street, May 4, 2017

cities.name: Las Vegas
cities.quote:
“I’m much, much richer than what they say. I’m a private person, nobody knows.”
– Donald J. Trump at rally in Las Vegas, NV on July 11th, 2015

cities.name: New York City
cities.quote:
“I’m the biggest developer in New York by far, there’s nobody even closer,” Trump said on Fox News in 1997. And on the pilot episode of The Apprentice: “My name is Donald Trump and I’m the largest real estate developer in New York.”
- Buzzfeed News, August 23, 2016

cities.name: Sunny Isles Beach
cities.quote:
“63 people with Russian addresses or passports have bought at least $98.4 million of in Trump-branded luxury towers in southern Florida”
– Reuters, March 17, 2017

cities.name: Istanbul
cities.quote:
Mr. Trump has received his fair share of bad publicity in Turkey. In June, President Recep Tayyip Erdogan even called for the towers to be renamed, in protest of Mr. Trump’s Islamophobic remarks during the campaign.
- New York Times, February 8, 2017

cities.name: Makati
cities.quote:
[Philippine President Rodrigo] Duterte appointed real estate magnate Jose E.B. Antonio as a special trade envoy to the U.S. — and Antonio happens to be the man building Trump Tower Manila... Antonio is the chairman of Century Properties and one of the Philippines' highest-profile businessmen; he previously has served as the country's special trade envoy to China.
NPR, November 22, 2016

cities.name: Seoul
cities.quote:
Donald Trump has his real estate footprints in South Korea as well, having lent his name to a construction company from the late 1990s to use on high-rise residential buildings in what was his first such arrangement with a foreign firm. Daewoo Engineering & Construction (Daewoo E&C), then a builder unit of the larger Daewoo Group, first partnered with Trump in September 1997 to erect the Trump World Tower in Manhattan.
- Yonhap News, May 11, 2016

cities.name: Mumbai
cities.quote:
Units in Trump Tower Mumbai are listed at prices roughly 30 percent higher than units in comparable buildings. The premium derives from the brand-licensing agreement the Trump Organization signed with the building’s developers: the Lodha Group, a giant, family-owned real estate empire much like Trump’s. The Lodhas staked the building’s success on Trump’s brand value.
- The Washington Post, January 6, 2017

cities.name: Panama
cities.quote:
Donald Trump was declared persona non grata by Panama City in 2011, after he told CNN that turning over the Panama Canal to the country was ‘‘foolish.’’
- The Boston Globe, December 29, 2016

cities.name: Toronto
cities.quote:
“It looked great at the time because it was such a novelty for the city. Trump was a big, big name, it looked like it would be a huge success, but the whole thing was doomed to failure.”
- Susan Pigg, a former real estate reporter with the Toronto Star who covered the saga of the Trump hotel.

cities.name: Vancouver
cities.quote:
Trump Tower in Vancouver renamed ‘Dump Tower’ on Google Maps
- Global News, November 27, 2016
